Class BasicTimeService

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.time.api.TimeService

    BasicTimeService implements the Sakai TimeService

      • different

        public boolean different(org.sakaiproject.time.api.Time a,
                org.sakaiproject.time.api.Time b)
        Compare two Time for differences, either may be null
        Specified by:
        different in interface org.sakaiproject.time.api.TimeService
        Parameters:
        a - One Time.
        b - The other Time.
        Returns:
        true if the Times are different, false if they are the same.
